description: Some car brands are pulling out all the stops to make car servicing or shopping an experience to look forward to. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Take your taste buds for a spin at car showrooms offering more than just coffee
title_page: Take your taste buds for a spin at car showrooms offering more than just coffee | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE â€“ Car showrooms are wooing customers with more than just cappuccino these days. Instead, dig into dim sum, nasi lemak, mala chicken and even dishes by a Michelin-starred chef.
Specially designed spaces enhance the lifestyle appeal of these car brands, while at the same time pampering those looking for a new set of wheels or just waiting for their cars to be serviced in the workshop.
